name: head
function: Inspiration and mental pressure to make sense of things

defined_mechanics.description: Consistent mental pressure to answer specific questions
challenges: Can't stop thinking about certain questions
Others may not understand your specific mental focus

open_mechanics.description: Samples and amplifies others' mental pressure and questions
traits: Wisdom about what questions are worth asking
open_mechanics.conditioning: Pressure to answer questions that aren't yours

somatic_scan_instructions: Feel the top of your head. Notice if there's pressure, buzzing, or stillness.
regulation_techniques: Ask: 'Is this question mine or am I amplifying someone else's?'
Release questions that don't belong to you
Honor the wisdom of not needing to answer everything

neuroception.safety_signals: Center operating in its correct frequency, no over-identification or conditioning
neuroception.threat_signals: Conditioning patterns active, attempting to be what you're not
